sentences.en: At early morning I went up through the hillside woods.
sentences.cn: 清晨我穿越山坡的小树林。

means.word_mean: 在上午；在早晨；每天上午</seg>

jx.jx_en_mean: (humorous)the morning after an evening of drinking, when one has a hangover
jx.jx_cn_mean: (幽默)（夜晚狂饮后仍未醒酒的）次日早上

entry.def: The morning is the part of each day between the time that people usually wake up and 12 o'clock noon or lunchtime.
entry.tran: 早晨;上午(从人们通常醒来到中午或午餐前的一段时间)

example.ex: During the morning your guide will take you around the city...
example.tran: 导游上午会带你们游览全城。

example.ex: On Sunday morning Bill was woken by the telephone...
example.tran: 星期天早晨，比尔被电话铃声吵醒了。

entry.def: If you refer to a particular time in the morning, you mean a time between 12 o'clock midnight and 12 o'clock noon.
entry.tran: 凌晨，早晨，上午(从子夜到中午的这段时间)

example.ex: I often stayed up until two or three in the morning...
example.tran: 我经常凌晨两三点才睡。

example.ex: The attack happened in the early hours of the morning.

entry.def: If you say that something will happen in the morning, you mean that it will happen during the morning of the following day.

example.ex: I'll fly it to London in the morning...
example.tran: 我明天上午会把它用航空快件寄到伦敦。

example.ex: Melanie promised that she would call them in the morning.
example.tran: 梅拉妮许诺第二天上午给他们打电话。

entry.def: If you say that something happens morning, noon and night, you mean that it happens all the time.
entry.tran: 日日夜夜;夜以继日；一直

example.ex: You get fit by playing the game, day in, day out, morning, noon and night.
example.tran: 从早到晚都坚持做这项运动，日复一日，你就能强壮起来。

means.word_mean: 1. the time period between dawn and noon;
2. a conventional expression of greeting or farewell

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from morn, on the pattern of evening

sentences.cn: 导游上午会带你们游览全城。
sentences.en: During the morning your guide will take you around the city...

sentences.cn: 我明天上午会把它用航空快件寄到伦敦。
sentences.en: I'll fly it to London in the morning...

sentences.cn: 梅拉妮许诺第二天上午给他们打电话。
sentences.en: Melanie promised that she would call them in the morning.

sentences.cn: 对于大多数人来说，最好的规划就是在上午吸收新信息，然后在下午尽量将其融入记忆中。
sentences.en: For most of us, the best plan is to take in new information in the morning and then try to consolidate it into memory during the afternoon.
sentences.from: 17年6月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 今天上午早些时候，总检察长办公室请公众提供协助，测一下自己的网速，并表示消费者(28)应该享有供应商向他们承诺提供的网速。

sentences.cn: 这太棒了！听我说，要不要搭我的车去城里？今天我可以用我爸的车，而且今天上午我没其他事要做。
sentences.en: That’s great! Listen, do you want a lift to the city? I have my dad’s car today and nothing else to do this morning.

sentences.cn: 没有你的爱,我什么都做不成; 有了你的爱,我没有什么做不成.
sentences.en: Without your love I can do nothing, with your love there is nothing I cannot do.

sentences.cn: 今天上午我在银行兑换了一张支票.
sentences.en: I cashed a cheque at the bank this morning.

sentences.cn: 那天上午, 天气还很好, 但下午突然.
sentences.en: That morning, the weather been fine, but in the afternoon It'suddenly.

sentences.cn: 现在车子的班次比上午少得多.
sentences.en: There are fewer trains now than in the morning.

sentences.cn: 星期六上午不用工作的时候, 你会干些 什么 ?
sentences.en: On Saturday morning are free from work, what will you do krub?

sentences.cn: 我饿了一上午, 禁不住狼吞虎咽了起来.
sentences.en: Being hungry for the whole morning, I couldn't help cramming myself.

sentences.cn: 今天上午他们买东西去了.
sentences.en: This morning they went shopping.

sentences.cn: 我打算每天上午发表一整张随感文字.
sentences.en: I shall publish a sheet full of thoughts every morning.

sentences.cn: 今天上午他不得不走去上班, 花了45分钟.
sentences.en: He had to walk to work this morning; it took three quarters of an hour.

sentences.cn: 整个上午学生们不断前来探问老师的健康情况.
sentences.en: Students have been calling all morning to inquire after their teacher.

sentences.cn: 每天服一瓶上午半瓶, 下午半瓶.
sentences.en: Take one bottle daily, half in the morning, half in the evening.

sentences.cn: 上午的体育课就取消了, 能呆在家里真是舒服.
sentences.en: The athletics lesson of morning canceled, the ability is foolish is really comfortable at home.

sentences.cn: 今天上午我拍了张照.
sentences.en: I had a picture taken this morning.

sentences.cn: 083请明天上午再来作治疗.
sentences.en: Please come tomorrow morning for another session.

sentences.cn: 这家商店星期日上午营业.
sentences.en: The store is open on sunday morning.

sentences.cn: 我不知道今天上午谁打来过电话.
sentences.en: I wonder who phoned this morning.

sentences.cn: 如果运气好, 我们黄昏,要不就在黎明就能找到那家伙.
sentences.en: With any luck, we'll find him by nightfall or in the morning.

sentences.cn: 夜去黎明至,苦尽佳境来.
sentences.en: Joy often come after sorrow , like morning after night.

sentences.cn: 记住, 黑夜之后总是黎明, 让我们拭目以待.
sentences.en: Remember, Morning has been all night coming, but see how surely it comes.

sentences.cn: 不过黎明一到我们就会变成南瓜吧?
sentences.en: But then the morning comes and we turn into pumpkins, right?

sentences.cn: 今天早上我黎明时分就起床了.
sentences.en: This morning I got up at cock crow.

sentences.cn: 黎明来临,曙光初至.
sentences.en: Morning shed its first light.

sentences.cn: 春天是一年的黎明, 万物苏醒.
sentences.en: Spring is morning of the year, when everything wakes up.

sentences.cn: 因为太阳在这个黎明没有升起在我们头顶.
sentences.en: That sun is not above our heads this morning.

sentences.cn: 浮云谦恭的泊于天空的一角, 黎明为它戴上了霞彩的冠冕.
sentences.en: The cloud humbly in a corner of the sky. The morning crowned it with splendor.

sentences.cn: 我将等待着黎明,而当我醒来的时候,就会看到在光明里的您的城市.
sentences.en: I shall wait for the morning and wake up to see thy city in the light.

sentences.cn: 那是你的将你带到黎明并且在早晨的光辉中消失.
sentences.en: It's yours to take with you into the morning, and it away there in the light.

sentences.cn: 一只雄鸡引吮长鸣,惊破了黎明时的苍穹.
sentences.en: The long crow of rooster split the gray morning sky.

sentences.cn: 我在酒吧待到了黎明才慢悠悠地回家.
sentences.en: I hung around the bar till morning then crawled home.

sentences.cn: 心灵从小事物的露水中发现了黎明,又焕然一新.
sentences.en: For in the dew of little things the heart finds morning and is refreshed.

sentences.cn: 黎明前,里威尔看到了塔里的两个灯光, 英国人从海上来了!
sentences.en: Toward morning Revere saw two lights in the tower. The British must be coming by sea!

sentences.cn: 这是一个隐隐约约的暗示,好像黎明的微光一样.
sentences.en: It is a faint intimation , yet so are the first streaks of morning.

sentences.cn: 在这熠熠光辉中,黎明终于降临了.
sentences.en: The morning appeared finally, in its splendour.

sentences.cn: 今晨黎明时,我船与一艘美国船相遇.
sentences.en: This morning at day we fell in with an American ship.

sentences.cn: 那个国家的早期非常艰苦.
sentences.en: The morning of the nation was a rough and difficult time.
